name: LNO/LR Tour Operator API
description: This API expose several methods tour operators can use to create and assign wedding/general lists to their agencies.
title: LNO and LR Api for Tour operators

header.title: Start here
header.content:
General

All requests to the API must be made using x-www-form-urlencoded format. To authenticate your request use the header x-auth-token on every call. The api will redirect any request from http to https. All responses are in JSON. The only handled errors are 400 for payload not validated and 500 for application erros.

DEVELOPING

Base url: https://touroperatordev.growish.com/v1

x-auth-token: Ask domingo.lupo@growish.com



PRODUCTION

In progress..
